message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to make a competitive offer. I'm offering the product to you for $175.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your effort. I would like to counter with an offer of $140 for the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand that you're trying to get a good deal, but I'm still looking for a price that reflects the product's true value. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $155.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $145 for the product.
I understand that you're trying to get a good deal, Bob, but I'm still not willing to go below $160. I'm willing to compromise and offer the product to you for $157.50.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your efforts. I would like to counter with an offer of $150 for the product.
I'm not willing to go below $155, Bob. I think the product is worth more than that. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $152.50.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your efforts. I would like to counter with an offer of $150 for the product.
